page.title: 14OLD JOHN MONUMENT.
page.content:
On a hill in Bradgate Park, near Anstey there is a tower Known as{Old {John}.This is the story of this strange building. Once lots of park keepers and farmers decided to have a party on the hill. They had a big pole in the middle with oil around it with fire up the pole. Nearly all the men were drunk, because of this they did not notice the pole falling. Suddenly it fell, hitting a man called{John}. The men were so upset about the accident that they built a tower and named it{OLD JOHN}. They built an arch at the side to make it look like a beer jug because John liked his beer very,very much.
By Jenny Marlow. Aged 11.
